meanings.definition: The marriage of people from different races or religions.
meanings.sent1: Intermarriages can help bring different cultures together.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, intermarriages are very common and accepted.
meanings.sent3: The intermarriages in our neighborhood have created a beautiful blend of traditions.
meanings.sent4: The intermarriages between the two communities acted as bridges of understanding.
meanings.sent5: The history books highlighted the significance of intermarriages in shaping societies.

meanings.definition: The act of marrying someone from a different family, tribe, or social group.
meanings.sent1: Intermarriages can lead to the exchange of customs and traditions.
meanings.sent2: She studied the history of intermarriages in ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The intermarriages in the story brought unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: His speech emphasized the importance of intermarriages in building connections.
meanings.sent5: The novel portrayed the challenges faced by characters in intermarriages.
